channel.title: Data on Luke Salamone's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Data on Luke Salamone's Blog

item.title: The Most Complex Chess Position of 2023
item.description: “Complex” isn’t a great word to describe this situation. I’m looking for a better term. The opening position in chess has 20 legal moves. From there, the number of legal moves in a position tends to increase as pieces move towards the center of the board, before decreasing as the number of pieces on the board drops in the endgame. People have composed artificial positions with a huge number of legal moves.
